trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control.

In a visual designer, when you switch from source view to a design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
When you switch back to source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
The ValidationSummaryDesigner objects provide design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> controls in a visual designer.
> [!NOTE] > This type is new as of ASP.NET 4.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ValidationSummaryDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ValidationSummaryDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
Returns a copy of the associated control for viewing or rendering on the design surface.
Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the properties grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to shadow control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, to add properties to the properties grid, to remove properties from the properties grid, and to change attributes of properties in the properties grid.
A collection that implements a dictionary of the added and shadowed properties.
